identified-content.org: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

abstract.p: Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers, nonprofit agency charged with administering Internet domain names and technical functions, says online balloting for its board members will be handled by Election.com; more than 76,000 Internet users worldwide have registered to participate in vote for five board members to be held from Oct 1 to Oct 10 (S)

block.p: The nonprofit agency charged with administering Internet domain names and technical functions said yesterday that online balloting for its board members would be handled by Election.com. More than 76,000 Internet users worldwide have registered to participate in the vote for five board members of the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers. The election, to be held from Oct. 1 to Oct. 10, will seat 5 of the group's 19 board members. Nine are named by advisory committees and four more will be elected by Internet users in the future.
